languages.text: "Что ты мне вещал про великую расу эльдаров? Видел бы ты себя сейчас, бесполезная ты трясущаяся тварь! Наложил в штаны от какого-то миража!"

traits.locale_text: "Что ты мне вещал про великую расу эльдаров? Видел бы ты себя сейчас, бесполезная ты трясущаяся тварь! Наложил в штаны от какого-то миража!"

languages.text: "What about all that talk of the great Aeldari race? If only you could see yourself now, you worthless, quivering beast! A mirage was all it took for you to soil yourself!"
languages.original_text: "Что ты мне вещал про великую расу эльдаров? Видел бы ты себя сейчас, бесполезная ты трясущаяся тварь! Наложил в штаны от какого-то миража!"

traits.locale_text: "What happened to all that talk of the great Aeldari race? If only you could see yourself now, you worthless, quivering beast! A mirage was all it took for you to shit yourself!"
"What happened to all that talk of the great Aeldari race? If only you could see yourself now, you worthless, quivering beast! A mirage was all it took for you to shit yourself!"
"What about all that talk of the great Aeldari race? If only you could see yourself now, you worthless, quivering beast! A mirage was all it took for you to soil yourself!"
"What about all that talk of the great Aeldari race? If only you could see yourself now, you worthless, quivering beast! A mirage was all it took for you to soil yourself!"
"What about all that talk of the great Aeldari race? If only you could see yourself now, you worthless, quivering beast! A mirage was all it took for you to soil yourself!"

languages.text: « Où sont tous vos beaux discours au sujet de la race des Aeldaris ? Regardez-vous un peu. Vous n'êtes plus qu'une bête enragée, une créature indigne ! Il a suffi d'un mirage pour que vous abandonniez toute dignité ! »
languages.original_text: "What about all that talk of the great Aeldari race? If only you could see yourself now, you worthless, quivering beast! A mirage was all it took for you to soil yourself!"

traits.locale_text: « Où sont tous vos beaux discours au sujet de la race des Aeldaris ? Regardez-vous un peu. Vous n'êtes plus qu'une bête enragée, une créature indigne ! Il a suffi d'un mirage pour que vous abandonniez toute dignité ! »

languages.text: 「偉大なるアエルダリ族についてははどうしたんだ？自分のしていることが分かっているのか？この役立たずの臆病な獣め！蜃気楼を見ただけで、お前は穢れてしまった！」
languages.original_text: "What about all that talk of the great Aeldari race? If only you could see yourself now, you worthless, quivering beast! A mirage was all it took for you to soil yourself!"

traits.locale_text: 「偉大なるアエルダリ族についてははどうしたんだ？自分のしていることが分かっているのか？この役立たずの臆病な獣め！蜃気楼を見ただけで、お前は穢れてしまった！」

languages.text: “你不是说你是什么艾达灵族的伟大后代吗？你真该看看你自己现在是什么熊样！你这只没用的畜生！光是看到个破幻象，就吓得你拉了一裤子！”
languages.original_text: "What about all that talk of the great Aeldari race? If only you could see yourself now, you worthless, quivering beast! A mirage was all it took for you to soil yourself!"

traits.locale_text: “你不是说你是什么艾达灵族的伟大后代吗？你真该看看你自己现在是什么熊样！你这只没用的畜生！光是看到个破幻象，就吓得你拉了一裤子！”

languages.text: "Was ist mit dem Gerede über die große Spezies der Aeldari? Wenn Ihr Euch jetzt nur sehen könntet, ihr wertlose, zitternde Bestie! Ein Trugbild hat ausgereicht, damit Ihr Euch einnässt!"
languages.original_text: "What about all that talk of the great Aeldari race? If only you could see yourself now, you worthless, quivering beast! A mirage was all it took for you to soil yourself!"

traits.locale_text: "Was ist mit dem Gerede über die große Spezies der Aeldari? Wenn Ihr Euch jetzt nur sehen könntet, ihr wertlose, zitternde Bestie! Ein Trugbild hat ausgereicht, damit Ihr Euch einnässt!"

languages.text: «¿Dónde ha quedado toda esa palabrería sobre la gran raza Aeldari? ¡Si te pudieras ver ahora, bestia inútil y temblorosa! ¡Ha bastado un simple espejismo para que ensucies los calzones!».
languages.original_text: "What about all that talk of the great Aeldari race? If only you could see yourself now, you worthless, quivering beast! A mirage was all it took for you to soil yourself!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Dónde ha quedado toda esa palabrería sobre la gran raza Aeldari? ¡Si te pudieras ver ahora, bestia inútil y temblorosa! ¡Ha bastado un simple espejismo para que ensucies los calzones!».

languages.text: "Ulu Aeldari ırkı hakkında söylediğin onca şeye ne oldu? Keşke şu an kendini görebilsen. İşe yaramaz, titrek hayvan! Bir serap gördün, ne haysiyetin kaldı ne bir şey!"
languages.original_text: "What about all that talk of the great Aeldari race? If only you could see yourself now, you worthless, quivering beast! A mirage was all it took for you to soil yourself!"

traits.locale_text: "Ulu Aeldari ırkı hakkındaki tüm o söylediklerine ne oldu? Keşke şu an kendini görebilseydin. Seni işe yaramaz, titrek hayvan! Bir serap, altını pisletmene yetti de arttı bile!"
